datafield.subfield: Faculty of Physics, University of Vienna, Boltzmanngasse 5, 1090 Vienna, Austria
Manipulating low-dimensional materials down to the level of single atoms with electron irradiation

• A short review on electron-beam based direct nanofabrication of 2D materials. • A short review of beam-induced dynamics as observed in TEM and STEM. • Initial results showing the controlled manipulation of individual impurities in graphene.
